description:
In this zany spoof, the Mido house has been relocated to the middle of the ocean. While no one but Seiji seems to notice anything wrong with this, the rest go along with their off beat day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother... Up and Down in the Sun, Floating Away. What Is It?
Onii-sama, Yurayura Kirakira Donburako Korette, Naan Da?
おにいさま, ゆらゆらきらきらどんぶらこ これって, なーんだ?
